name: Code Happy by Dayle Rees
text: Application development with the Laravel PHP Framework for beginners. http://laravel.com This is a self published title written by one of the Laravel Core Team developers. The original ebook sold over 700 copies within four months. The title is a guide to many of the core features of the Laravel framework, along with a tutorial explaining how to create a simple blog from the ground up. The book is printed in A4 with nicely sized type and clear code samples, along with a perfect bound full colour cover.
